ai-mil7.3.7:1.1_0: “A lonely entering the woods all at once?”
ai-mil7.3.7:1.3_0: In the same way, a cow with wandering shade of the marks and going out and coming back, when looking ahead and aside; when bending and extending the limbs; when bearing the outer robe, bowl and robes; when eating, drinking, chewing, and tasting; when urinating and defecating; when walking, standing, sitting, sleeping, waking, speaking, and keeping silent.
ai-mil7.3.7:1.4_0: That’s what has been chest down.
ai-mil7.3.7:1.5_0: But great king, the gods have been spoken by the Buddha, the gods of the Thirty-Three, and also will instruct us.”
ai-mil7.3.7:2.1_0: Antelope hides in the seventh part.
